\newcommand{\ottdruleaxXXidapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\texttt{\textcolor{red}{<<no parses (char 8):     (I t***) -->  t >>}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ax\_idapp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleaxXXselapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\texttt{\textcolor{red}{<<no parses (char 9):     ((K t***) t') -->  t >>}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ax\_selapp}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleaxXXcombapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\texttt{\textcolor{red}{<<no parses (char 10):     (((S t***) t') t'') -->  ((t t'')(t' t'')) >>}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{ax\_combapp}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{t}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{t'}$}{\ottcom{\ottsym{t1} reduces to \ottsym{t2}}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleaxXXidapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleaxXXselapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleaxXXcombapp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
